ftbquests.chapter.armor__weapons.title: Armor + Weapons[--护甲+武器--]
ftbquests.chapter.armor__weapons.quests0: Isn't it weird to think that everything is so unstable?[--觉得一切如此不稳定不奇怪吗?--]
Like, we all believe in the magic of technology; it feels so permanent but, just like that, it's gone.[--就像,我们都相信科技的魔幻;它感觉如此永恒,但就像这样,它消失了。--]
ftbquests.chapter.armor__weapons.quests1: Manasteel Armor[--魔力钢护甲--]
&eBotania&r offers 3 Tiers of Armor. The first one being the &bManasteel Armor&r[--&eBotania&r提供3级盔甲。第一个是&b魔力钢盔甲&r--]
This offers you the same armor as Iron Armor does, but it comes with the benefit of reduced Mana Cost when using Botania Tools[--这提供与铁盔甲相同的护甲值,但使用植物魔法工具会减少魔力消耗--]
Also, this Armor can be repaired with Mana[--另外,这套盔甲可以用魔力修复--]
ftbquests.chapter.armor__weapons.quests2: Elementium Armor[--源质钢护甲--]
After tossing some &6Manasteel&r into the Elven Portal and you will obtain some &bElementium&r[--将一些&6魔力钢锭&r扔进精灵传送门后获得一些&b源质钢锭&r--]
This can be used to make some better Armor[--这可以用来制作更好的盔甲--]
In addition to the effects of &6Manasteel Armor&r, the &bElementium Armor&r also spawns Pixies when you are getting attacked[--除了&6魔力钢护甲&r的效果外,&b源质钢护甲&r在你受到攻击时也会生成精灵--]
Random Rune[--随机符文--]
ftbquests.chapter.armor__weapons.quests3: As final tier of Armor from &eBotania&r we have the &bTerrasteel Armor Set&r[--作为&eBotania&r的终阶护甲,我们可以制作&b泰拉钢套装&r--]
This gives various buffs to the player, which are all located in the tooltip of the Armor[--这为玩家提供了各种增益,可以查看它的护甲提示--]
ftbquests.chapter.armor__weapons.quests4: A sharp long butter knife[--尖锐的黄油长刃--]
Surprisingly butter-proof...[--令人惊叹的黄油强度......--]
I'm sure you'll be able to make one of these.[--我敢肯定,你可以制作其中之一。--]
I'd be concerned if you can't![--如果你不能,我会很担心的!--]
ftbquests.chapter.armor__weapons.quests5: High damage and unbreakable.[--高耐久和坚不可摧。--]
You just... have to craft it, don't let the &6Unstable Ingots&r explode[--你只需要...制作它,不要让&6不稳定金属锭&r爆炸--]
ftbquests.chapter.armor__weapons.quests6: An upgraded Sword compared to the &6Manasteel Sword&r[--相比于&6魔力钢剑&r的升级--]
It does the same amount of base damage, but in addtion, it has a chance to spawn Pixies when hitting entities[--它有着相同的基础伤害,但不同的是,它有几率在击中实体时生成精灵--]
ftbquests.chapter.armor__weapons.quests7: Your magical counterpart to an &6Iron Sword&r[--&6铁剑&r的魔力版本--]
This &bManasteel Sword&r does have the benefit, that it can easily be repaired with Mana[--这把&b魔力钢剑&r确实有其好处,它可以轻松用魔力修复--]
ftbquests.chapter.armor__weapons.quests8: A somewhat cheap sword that uses RF instead of durability![--一把有点便宜的剑,使用RF代替耐久!--]
ftbquests.chapter.armor__weapons.quests9: May the Force be with you![--愿原力与你同在!--]
&eForceCraft&r offers it's own Tools and Weapons[--&力量工艺&r提供了它自己的工具和武器--]
which can be enhanced with a &6Force Infuser&r. If you craft a &bForce Sword&r you get the Infuser for free[--可以使用&6力量附魔台&r增强.如果你制作了&b力量剑&r,你可以获得免费附魔--]
ftbquests.chapter.armor__weapons.quests1: Have you tried Terraria yet?[--你玩过泰拉瑞亚吗?--]
Inspired by Terraria, the &eBotania&r Developer added the Terra Blade[--在泰拉利亚的启发下,&e植物魔法&r的开发者添加了泰拉之刃--]
This Sword has the same damage value as a &6Diamond Sword&r but, it also shoots out a Mana Burst[--这把剑的耐久度与&6钻石剑&r相同,但它可以射出魔力脉冲--]
Only those as powerful as vazkii can wield such a sword[--只有像Vazkii这样强大的人才能使用这样一把剑--]
So uh... Everyone who crafts it.[--所以,呃...所有制作它的人。--]
Force Armor[--力量套装--]
\"Hello there!\" - General Kenobi[--\"嗨，你们好!\" - General Kenobi--]
Crafting this &bForce Armor&r may, or may not show you the Jedi's way[--制作这个&b力量盔甲&r会也可能不会告诉你绝地之道 ps:“力量”(force)在星球大战中为“原力”--]
As &2Yoda&r likes to say[--就像&2Yoda&r喜欢说的一样--]
&o“Adventure. Excitement. A Jedi craves not these things.”&r[--&o“冒险。激情。绝地人不想要这些东西。”&r--]
Luckily, you aren't a Jedi.[--幸运的是,你不是绝地武士。--]
Flux-Infused Armor[--红石充能护甲--]
Using &6Flux-Infused Gems&r to create these powerful Armor allows you to power it up with &6Forge Energy[--使用&6红石充能水晶&r来制作这些强大的盔甲,你可以用&6FE为它供电--]
This will make it more durable and give better defense.[--这使其更加耐用,提供更好的防御。--]
Be sure to recharge it from time to time![--一定要时不时给它充电!--]
Vanilla Armor[--原版护甲--]
Good Ol' Vanilla[--原版也超棒--]
In most packs, you start off with some basic &bArmor&r[--在大多数整合包中,你都要从一些基础的&b护甲&r开始--]
&eFTB Skies&r is no exception. Craft some &bVanilla Armor&r and reap your rewards[--&eFTB Skies&r也不例外。制作一些&b原版盔甲&r并收取你的奖励--]
Vanilla Helmets[--原版头盔--]
Vanilla Chestplate[--原版胸甲--]
Vanilla Leggings[--原版护腿--]
Vanilla Boots[--原版靴子--]
Generic Armors[--通用护甲--]
Various Mods, like &eCyclic and Thermal Expansion&r offer their own set of &bArmor&r[--各种模组,比如&e循环和热力膨胀&r都会提供自己的&b护甲&r--]
Might be worth a shot to check them out![--也许它们值得瞅一瞅!--]
Modded Helmets[--模组头盔--]
Modded Chestplates[--模组胸甲--]
Modded Leggings[--模组护腿--]
Modded Boots[--模组靴子--]
Modded Swords[--模组剑--]
Various Mods, like &eCyclic and Thermal Expansion&r offer their own set of &bTools and Weapons&r[--各种模组,比如&e循环和热力膨胀&r提供它们自己自己的&b工具与武器&r--]
Might be worth a shot to check them out![--也许它们值得瞅一瞅!--]
Enchanting in &dFTB Skies&r is quite a bit different, thanks to &eApotheosis&r[--在&dFTB Skies&r中附魔有一定不同,多亏了&e神话&r--]
There are many new mechanics, which you can read about in &6Chronicles of Shadows&r[--有很多新的机制,你可以在&6阴影编年史&r中读到这些--]
ftbquests.chapter.armor__weapons.quests2: The &bSalvaging Table&r will allow you to break down any loot that has affix modifiers of uncommon or greater quality.[--&b回收台&r可以让你分解任何具有罕见或更高质量的词缀升级的战利品.--]
Depending on the item you will get back some components based on the rarity of the item destroyed.[--取决于你分解的物品的稀有度获得一些组件。--]
You can use this to refine the material into new affixes in the &6Reforging Table&r.[--你可以用它将材料在&6重铸台&r精炼出新词缀.--]
Random Gem[--随机宝石--]

The &bReforging Table&r can allows you to imbue any weapon or armor with the apotheotic forged powers. This will allow you to create or recreate affix properties on any valid item. The type of affix that is applied will depend on the rarity of the materials you use to forge the item. [--&b重铸台&r可以让你用神话锻造能力锻造任何武器或盔甲。这将允许你在任何有效的物品上创建或重新创建词缀属性。词缀类型取决于你用来制作物品的材料的稀有度。--]
The process also requires some amount of gem dust which is obtained when dropping an anvil on gems. [--这个过程还需要一些宝石粉,这是用铁砧砸神铸宝石时获得的。--]
It should be noted that while I can continue reforging to get an affix I like, the forging process is irreversible. [--需要注意的是,虽然我可以继续重铸来得到我喜欢的词缀,但锻造过程是不可逆的。--]
&bEquipment Tomes&r can be enchanted like Books, but &6only accept enchantments of a specific type&r.[--&b附魔宝典&r可以像书一样附魔,但&6只接受特定类型的附魔&r.--]
Only Boot Enchantments can go on the Tome of Boots, etc.[--想要靴子的附魔可以附魔靴子宝典等等.--]
The &bTome of Scrapping&r can be combined with an enchanted item in the Anvil to destroy it, &6removing half of the enchantments&r onto a new Book.[--&b拆解宝典&r可以与铁砧中的附魔物品结合并摧毁它,&6将一半附魔&r转移到一本新书上.--]
Equipment Tomes[--附魔宝典--]
The &bSocket Sigil&r is a magic tool that allows me to &6add Gem Sockets to tools&r.[--&b镶孔符石&r是一种允许我&6将宝石镶到工具上&r的魔法工具.--]
You &6can reroll&r, but rerolling &ccan go down instead of up&r.[--你&6可以进行重随&r,但重随&c可以向下而不是向上&r.--]
Using the &bGem Cutting Table&r allows you to refine &6Gem Dust and Rarity Materials&r into new Gems[--使用&b宝石切割台&r可以将&6宝石粉和稀有材料&r升级为新的宝石--]
Where to store all my books!?[--在哪里放我的那些个附魔书!!--]
The &bEnchantment Library&r is a block that stores &6Echantments&r. Inserting an enchanted book will deposit it.[--&b附魔图书馆&r是一个存储&6附魔&r的方块。放入附魔书附魔就会被存储.--]
Left—clicking on a stored enchantment will extract one level of it. Shift—clicking will extract the max level available.[--左键单击存储的附魔会提取一个等级。Shift单击将提取最大可用等级.--]
Random Bookshelf[--随机书架--]
Splitting the &mAtoms&r Enchantments[--分解&m阿图姆&r附魔--]
Using the &6Splitting&r enchant on an &bAnvil&r will allow you to split &6multiple Enchants&r on one book into seperate books[--在&b铁砧&r上附上&6拆分&r附魔可以让你将一本书上的&6多附魔&r分解成多本单附魔的附魔书--]
Using the &bObliteration&r enchant will allow you to split &6singular&r enchanted Books into seperate levels of Enchants[--使用&b分裂&r附魔可以将&6单本&r附魔书分解为上级附魔等级附魔书--]
